Class IncidentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.incident_management.model.manager.IncidentManager

  • public class IncidentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages all of the incidents and facilitates program execution
    Author:
    Max Richgruber

        Adds an incident with the specified parameters to the list
        Parameters:
        caller - the person calling in the incident
        c - the category the incident falls under
        p - the priority level of the incident
        name - the name of the incident
        workNote - the note describing the incident
